root: ^Matt, I was informed you were running late again. Would you mind telling me why?
^I-I'm sorry sir, I just had a bad morning, please I won't let it happen again
^O-Oh hi Mr. Boss! There was a lot of traffic this morning, I'm so sorry

SayNothing: ^Sorry Sir, I'm just...a bit distracted today...
AppologiseAfterSayingNothing: ^I don't pay you to stand around watching clouds go by and I most DEFINITELY do not pay you to arrive at work whenever you feel like it.
^Get to work Mathew, or I'll have security escort you off the premises.
MakeUpExcuse: ^You'd better not let it happen again.
TrafficExcuse: ^Tsk- Very well...Don't waste any more of my time.
